# BayesLinearKinematics

Adjusting beliefs using Bayes linear (kinematics) rules via an R
package.

This package allows for the representation of second-order beliefs about
variables to stored in a `bl` class (which is introduced in this
package). The package provides functions to update beliefs using
standard Bayes linear rules (as described in Goldstein and Wooff, 2007),
to update using kinematics (as described in Goldstein and Shaw, 2004)
and to perform operations on beliefs (like subseting and calculating
resolutions).

## Installation

You can install the latest version of BayesLinearKinematics from GitHub
with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("johnpaulgosling/BayesLinearKinematics", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

## Cite us

If you use this package in your work, please cite using the latest
citation information:

``` r
citation("BayesLinearKinematics")
```

## References

Goldstein, M. & Shaw, S. C. (2004). Bayes linear kinematics and Bayes
linear Bayes graphical models. *Biometrika*, **91**, 425-46.

Goldstein, M. & Wooff, D. (2007). *Bayes linear statistics: Theory and
methods*. John Wiley & Sons.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`bl`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/bl.md)
  : An S4 class to represent a Bayes linear object.
- [`bl_adjust()`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/bl_adjust.md)
  : Bayes linear kinematic adjustment
- [`bl_data`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/bl_data.md)
  : An S4 class to represent data for a Bayes linear adjustment.
- [`bl_resolution()`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/bl_resolution.md)
  : Calculate Bayes linear variance resolution
- [`bl_subset()`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/bl_subset.md)
  : bl object subsetting
- [`hellinger_squared()`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/hellinger_squared.md)
  : Squared Hellinger distance between two bl objects
- [`plot(`*`<bl>`*`)`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/plot-bl-method.md)
  : Plot method for bl class ('plot')
- [`plot(`*`<bl_data>`*`)`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/plot-bl_data-method.md)
  : Plot method for bl_data class ('plot')
- [`print(`*`<bl>`*`)`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/print-bl-method.md)
  : Print method for bl class
- [`print(`*`<bl_data>`*`)`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/print-bl_data-method.md)
  : Print method for bl_data class
- [`show(`*`<bl>`*`)`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/show-bl-method.md)
  : Basic show method for bl class
- [`show(`*`<bl_data>`*`)`](https://johnpaulgosling.github.io/BayesLinearKinematics/reference/show-bl_data-method.md)
  : Basic show method for bl_data class
